title: Minigues German is bad, nothing he says makes sense
text: Minigue is still new to German and chatting in English will make it easier for both of you ;)

title: MiniguePT randomly started speaking German
text: Like the creator, MiniguePT seems to be somewhat bilingual. If you keep using English, it’ll switch back quickly.

title: MiniguePTs replies are nonsensical and/or it only replies to itself
text: It’s best to just delete Minigues reply and your question and then ask again, worded differently!

title: I found some quirk in MiniguePT
text: Feel free to share it! We’d be very happy to hear about it. Either message us on GitHub or via direct message.

title: What are you doing with my chat inputs?
text: Except for generating a response from MiniguePT - nothing. We have no idea what you are messaging the bot and we don't care either.

title: What about when I like/dislike a certain conversation?
text: When you like/dislike a conversation we save the last few messages you exchanged with Minigue and use it to improve the bot in the future!
